word: G4053 - περισσός - perissós - per-is-sos' - Exceeding abundantly above

sections.paragraph: மிஞ்சின, விசேஷித்த, மேன்மையுள்ள, அதிக, மிகவும், உறுதியாய்.பரிபூரணமான - பெயரடை
exceeding some nu number or measure or rank or need

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: From G4012 (in the sense of beyond); superabundant (in quantity) or superior (in quality); by implication excessive; adverb (with G1537) violently; neuter (as noun) preeminence: - exceeding abundantly above, more abundantly, advantage, exceedingly, very highly, beyond measure, more, superfluous, vehement [-ly].
Cognate: G4050, G4051, G4052, G4053, G4057, G5248, G5249
